author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Thanks for this information, the UK media has only mentioned this second ship in passing without any details.

Hagland Captain Engine: MAK GM 25 1,980 kW

range, Caterpillar acquired MaK Motoren GmbH & Co. KG in 1997.
